sn35.87:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn35.87:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahacundo ayasma ca channo gijjhakute pabbate viharanti.
sn35.87:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena yena ayasma channo abadhiko hoti dukkhito balhagilano.
sn35.87:1.4: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma mahacundo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahacundam etadavoca:
sn35.87:1.6: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma mahacundo ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosi.
sn35.87:2.1: Atha kho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahacundo yenayasma channo tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidimsu. Nisajja kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam channam etadavoca:
sn35.87:2.2: “kacci te, avuso channa, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti no abhikkamanti, patikkamosanam pannayati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35.87:3.1: “Na me, avuso sariputta, khamaniyam na yapaniyam, balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti no patikkamanti, abhikkamosanam pannayati no patikkamo.
sn35.87:3.2: Seyyathapi, avuso, balava puriso tinhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho, avuso, adhimatta vata muddhani uhananti.
sn35.87:3.3: Na me, avuso, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam …pe… no patikkamo.
sn35.87:3.4: Seyyathapi, avuso, balava puriso dalhena varattakkhandena sise sisavetham dadeyya; evameva kho, avuso, adhimatta sise sisavedana.
sn35.87:3.5: Na me, avuso, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam …pe… no patikkamo.
sn35.87:3.6: Seyyathapi, avuso, dakkho goghatako va goghatakantevasi va tinhena govikantanena kucchim parikanteyya; evameva kho adhimatta vata kucchim parikantanti.
sn35.87:3.7: Na me, avuso, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam …pe… no patikkamo.
sn35.87:3.8: Seyyathapi, avuso, dve balavanto purisa dubbalataram purisam nanabahasu gahetva angarakasuya santapeyyum samparitapeyyum; evameva kho, avuso, adhimatto kayasmim daho.
sn35.87:3.9: Na me, avuso, khamaniyam, na yapaniyam, balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti no patikkamanti, abhikkamosanam pannayati no patikkamo.
sn35.87:3.10: Sattham, avuso sariputta, aharissami, navakankhami jivitan”ti.
sn35.87:4.2: Yapetayasma channo, yapentam mayam ayasmantam channam icchama.
sn35.87:4.3: Sace ayasmato channassa natthi sappayani bhojanani, aham ayasmato channassa sappayani bhojanani pariyesissami.
sn35.87:4.4: Sace ayasmato channassa natthi sappayani bhesajjani, aham ayasmato channassa sappayani bhesajjani pariyesissami.
sn35.87:4.5: Sace ayasmato channassa natthi patirupa upatthaka, aham ayasmantam channam upatthahissami.
sn35.87:4.7: Yapetayasma channo, yapentam mayam ayasmantam channam icchama”ti.
sn35.87:5.1: “Na me, avuso sariputta, natthi sappayani bhojanani;
sn35.87:5.7: Api ca me, avuso, sattha paricinno digharattam manapeneva, no amanapena.
sn35.87:5.8: Etanhi, avuso, savakassa patirupam yam sattharam paricareyya manapeneva, no amanapena.
sn35.87:5.9: ‘Anupavajjam channo bhikkhu sattham aharissati’ti—evametam, avuso sariputta, dharehi”ti.
sn35.87:6.1: “Puccheyyama mayam ayasmantam channam kancideva desam, sace ayasma channo okasam karoti panhassa veyyakaranaya”ti.
sn35.87:7.1: “Cakkhum, avuso channa, cakkhuvinnanam cakkhuvinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassasi …pe…
sn35.87:7.2: jivham, avuso channa, jivhavinnanam jivhavinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassasi …pe…
sn35.87:7.3: manam, avuso channa, manovinnanam manovinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassasi”ti?
sn35.87:8.1: “Cakkhum, avuso sariputta, cakkhuvinnanam cakkhuvinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassami …pe…
sn35.87:8.2: jivham, avuso sariputta, jivhavinnanam jivhavinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassami …pe…
sn35.87:8.3: manam, avuso sariputta, manovinnanam manovinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassami”ti.
sn35.87:9.1: “Cakkhusmim, avuso channa, cakkhuvinnane cakkhuvinnanavinnatabbesu dhammesu kim disva kim abhinnaya cakkhum cakkhuvinnanam cakkhuvinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassasi …
sn35.87:9.2: jivhaya, avuso channa, jivhavinnane jivhavinnanavinnatabbesu dhammesu kim disva kim abhinnaya jivham jivhavinnanam jivhavinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassasi …
sn35.87:9.3: manasmim, avuso channa, manovinnane manovinnanavinnatabbesu dhammesu kim disva kim abhinnaya manam manovinnanam manovinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassasi”ti?
sn35.87:10.1: “Cakkhusmim, avuso sariputta, cakkhuvinnane cakkhuvinnanavinnatabbesu dhammesu nirodham disva nirodham abhinnaya cakkhum cakkhuvinnanam cakkhuvinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassami …pe…
sn35.87:10.2: jivhaya, avuso sariputta, jivhavinnane jivhavinnanavinnatabbesu dhammesu nirodham disva nirodham abhinnaya jivham jivhavinnanam jivhavinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassami …pe…
sn35.87:10.3: manasmim, avuso sariputta, manovinnane manovinnanavinnatabbesu dhammesu nirodham disva nirodham abhinnaya manam manovinnanam manovinnanavinnatabbe dhamme ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti samanupassami”ti.
sn35.87:11.1: Evam vutte, ayasma mahacundo ayasmantam channam etadavoca:
sn35.87:11.2: “tasmatiha, avuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato sasanam niccakappam sadhukam manasi katabbam:
sn35.87:11.8: Cutupapate asati nevidha na huram na ubhayamantarena.
sn35.87:12.1: Atha kho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahacundo ayasmantam channam imina ovadena ovaditva utthayasana pakkamimsu.
sn35.87:12.2: Atha kho ayasma channo acirapakkantesu tesu ayasmantesu sattham aharesi.
sn35.87:13.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.87:13.4: “Nanu te, sariputta, channena bhikkhuna sammukhayeva anupavajjata byakata”ti?
sn35.87:13.7: “Honti hete, sariputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulani suhajjakulani upavajjakulani.
sn35.87:13.8: Na kho panaham, sariputta, ettavata saupavajjoti vadami.
sn35.87:13.9: Yo kho, sariputta, tanca kayam nikkhipati, annanca kayam upadiyati, tamaham saupavajjoti vadami.
